title: Hero MotoCorp sales up 10 pc in Feb at 3,94,460 units
description: "The volumes in the month of February indicate the continuously improving consumer sentiment and the company expects the positive trend to continue in the coming months, on the back of favourable economic indicators," Hero MotoCorp said in a statement.
